text: la ybah lak alnisa' min baed nsayk allaati fa esmtk, wallaati abhnahnn lak (whnn almdhkwrat fi alayat alssabiqat raqm [50] min hadhih alswr), wamin kanat fi esmtk min alnisa' almdhkwrat laa yahilu lak 'an ttlliqha mstqbala watati bghyrha badalaan mnha, walaw 'aejabak jmalha, wa'amaa alziyadat ealaa zwjatk min ghyr ttlyq 'iihdahuna fala haraj elyk, wa'amaa ma malakat yaminuk min al'ima', fhlal lak minhuna min shyt. wakan allah ealaa kl shay' rqybana, la yaghib eanh eilm shy'
